tool_description: Creates initial catalog entries for new objects entering the museum collection, assigning unique identifiers and establishing basic record structure.

object_title.description: Primary title or name of the object

object_type.description: Category of object: painting, sculpture, textile, photograph, manuscript, ceramic, jewelry, furniture, other

acquisition_method.description: How object was acquired: purchase, gift, bequest, loan, transfer, field_collection

acquisition_date.description: Date object was acquired by institution

department.description: Curatorial department responsible for the object

error_messages: Invalid object type: Must be one of [painting, sculpture, textile, photograph, manuscript, ceramic, jewelry, furniture, other]
Invalid acquisition method: Must be one of [purchase, gift, bequest, loan, transfer, field_collection]
Invalid acquisition date: Must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format
Missing required field: All parameters must be provided
Department not found: Specified department does not exist in institutional records
usage: Provide basic object information to generate a new catalog record. This should be the first step in processing any new museum object.

accession_number.description: Unique identifier assigned to the object

registration_status.description: Current status of the registration process
